description: In my final year project, I played a key role in developing a Blockchain Crowdfunding Platform. This innovative platform aimed to transform traditional crowdfunding by leveraging blockchain technology for enhanced security and transparency. My primary contributions involved crafting the user interface using React and Tailwind CSS, cutting-edge technologies that elevated the user experience.

For my first-degree project, I developed an Online Drug Delivery System using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. This project aimed to provide a user-friendly platform for ordering pharmaceuticals online. Key highlights include a responsive and visually appealing user interface crafted with Bootstrap and CSS. The system allowed users to easily browse and select medications. JavaScript was employed to efficiently manage orders, enabling users to add items to their cart and view order details. This project marked the beginning of my academic journey, offering valuable experience in web development technologies and user-focused design.

My personal project was the creation of a resume website, designed to showcase my skills and experience. This project served as a valuable learning opportunity where I applied my knowledge of basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript gained from various online courses.
